system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.53RM572RAaaWLZqq]{Simple Weapon Specialist (Light Club,}@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.53RM572RAaaWLZqq]{Medium Club,}@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.53RM572RAaaWLZqq]{Heavy Club,} @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.53RM572RAaaWLZqq]{Tool Hammer or}@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.53RM572RAaaWLZqq]{Sledgehammer)}

Benefits

When wielding a light club, medium club, heavy club, tool hammer, or sledgehammer, the Critical Threat range is 14-18.

Normal

The Critical Threat range for a light club, medium club, heavy club, tool hammer, or sledgehammer is 16-18.
